explanation: The majority of the live chat expresses bullish sentiment for BTC, anticipating new all-time highs (ATH), strong upward momentum, and targets around 108,000-109,500 and possibly higher. Many users mention entering or adding to long positions, and only a minority discuss shorting or caution about pullbacks. There is significant talk of breaking above resistance, strong buying interest at current levels, and expectation of further price increases, supported by bullish technical and sentiment factors. The presence of a few mentions of pullbacks or corrections is outweighed by the number and intensity of positive/long comments.
